survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers about their experience using the platform to help improve services and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the freelance platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover the frequency spectrum.

script.question_text: How often do you use the freelance platform?

questions.question_text: What type of freelance work do you primarily seek on the platform?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with a checkbox option for 'Other' to capture niche categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of freelance work do you primarily seek on the platform?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the platform's job matching algorithm? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is labeled appropriately.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the platform's job matching algorithm? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What features do you find most valuable on the platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you find most valuable on the platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Consider limiting response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text (OPEN_TEXT) with a character limit.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the platform to other freelancers? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a 10-point scale for nuanced feedback. Ensure the scale endpoints are clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 10-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the platform to other freelancers? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the platform's customer support responsiveness?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point qualitative scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the platform's customer support responsiveness?

questions.question_text: Which of the following improvements would most enhance your experience on the platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow selection of up to 3 options. Include an 'Other' field for additional suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a max selection of 3 and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following improvements would most enhance your experience on the platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How important is the platform's fee structure in your decision to accept a job?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance.

script.question_text: How important is the platform's fee structure in your decision to accept a job?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture final thoughts. Limit response to 1000 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text (OPEN_TEXT) with a character limit.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the platform?
